definition: to yearn for sth day and night (idiom)
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Of them must be strong, dare never forget.
sentences.chinese: 要有多堅強，纔敢朝思暮想。

sentences.english: For your yearn day and night, especially you that piece of cheek.
sentences.chinese: 爲你朝思暮想，尤其是你那張臉蛋。

sentences.english: I finally bought that new car I always wanted.
sentences.chinese: 我終於買了我朝思暮想的那輛新車。

sentences.english: You have been the one for me.
sentences.chinese: 我還沒有離開，就已經對你朝思暮想。

sentences.english: I can't take my mind off her since my first sight at her.
sentences.chinese: 自從我第一眼見到她就開始朝思暮想。

definition: to miss/to yearn day and night
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
to cherish the memory of sb/to think of with respect
